Name: Devil's Eyes
About the game: Mike arrives at university and is ready to have a time of his life, but something is not quite right. Follow the story and unveil the mysteries behind the tragic events. Devil's Eyes is a detective thriller story packed into a kinetic visual novel format. Features - Beautiful artwork - Engaging story - Two to four hours length.
